text:
From the mod_ftp docs page: http://httpd.apache.org/mod_ftp/ftp/index.html

There are two pages with completely blank content.

http://httpd.apache.org/mod_ftp/ftp/ftp_howto.html
http://httpd.apache.org/mod_ftp/ftp/ftp_faq.html

The first section would be very helpful to have. E.g. how do I set up a basic FTP site, what's an example setup with implicit/explicit SSL, how do I set it up so that each user only sees their own home directory, how would I use LDAP auth, etc.

The second section could probably be dropped, unless people are actually asking questions...
creator: lmeyer@vmware.com
rbowen@apache.org
text: I've just commented out those links, because I don't see the being written any time soon.
